cards.description: [ACTIVATED] If your opponent activated a Spell last turn: Apply that Spell's activated effect.
[ACTIVATED] Equip 1 Equipment from your opponent's Grave to an opponent's Champion then you can Shuffle 1 Equipment from the Field into the Deck.
[ACTIVATED] Discard 1 'Useless Potion' then Deal 40 damage to a Champion.
[ACTIVATED] Equip 1 'Extra Padding' from your Deck to your Champion then Heal 10 damage from that Champion.
[ACTIVATED] Look at the top 5 cards of your Deck and place them back in any order then Draw a card.
[ACTIVATED] Return all Equipment from the Field to the Hand.
[ACTIVATED] Shuffle this card and 1 card from each Grave into the Deck.
[ACTIVATED] Deal 10 damage to each Champion for each of their Equipment Slots
[ACTIVATED] Destroy 1 Earth Equipment equipped to your Champion then you can Equip 'Popping Spores' from Grave to that Champion
[ACTIVATED] Send the top two cards of your opponent's Deck to the Grave.
